item.title: Lachlan Murdoch, Free From Family Squabbles, Chases Younger Audiences for Fox
item.description: Lachlan Murdoch just won control of his family’s two media companies, Fox Corp. and News Corp., after a fractious and much-scrutinized legal scrum among the eldest children of founder Rupert Murdoch.

item.title: Lachlan Murdoch, Free From Family Squabbles, Chases Younger Audiences for Fox
item.description: Lachlan Murdoch just won control of his family’s two media companies, Fox Corp. and News Corp., after a fractious and much-scrutinized legal scrum among the eldest children of founder Rupert Murdoch.

item.title: Fox Sees New Ad Dollars for Sports, News, Streaming in Latest Upfront Close
item.description: Fears that Trump tariffs would dampen TV’s annual “upfront” advertising market appear to have been overblown — at least for those media companies with a strong sports portfolio
